p.d: Luna works in a market garden near Montpellier. Young, attractive and funny, she is ready to do anything to keep the love of Ruben, her boyfriend. During an evening when everyone drinks too much, they assault a young unknown. A few weeks later he reappears in Luna's life. Directed by: Elsa Diringer (France, 2016) Cast: Laëtitia Clément (Luna), Rod Paradot (Alex), Lyna Khoudri (Chloé), Julien Bodet (Ruben), Frédéric Pierrot (Sébastien), Juliette Arnaud (Corinne) Genre: drama Awards: Best first film (COLCOA 2018), First Rendezvous (Cabourg 2018)
